ScriptGroup.name: Init external lua scripts
ScriptGroup.script:
MG_LUA_SAVE_DIR = "/home/kst/Dropbox/games/mg-save"
local mg_lua = "/home/kst/work/mg-lua" package.path = package.path..";"..mg_lua.."/lib/?.lua;"..mg_lua.."/lua/?.lua"
require "mudlet/mudlet-adapter" require "mudlet/gui"
require "init"
local mg_custom = "/home/kst/work/mg-custom" package.path = package.path..";"..mg_custom.."/lua/?.lua"
require "init-custom"
